TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonPosition implements class System.IEquatable`1<class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition>

summary.span: 表示 Microsoft Office 菜单上功能区控件相对于内置控件的位置、选项卡相对于内置选项卡的位置或组相对于内置组的位置。

span.span: Represents the location of a Ribbon control on the Microsoft Office Menu relative to a built-in control, the location of a tab relative to a built-in tab, or the location of a group relative to a built-in group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的属性可以指定内置选项卡上的组相对于选项卡上的内置组的位置。 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：自定义内置选项卡](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab)。Use the property of a to specify the location of a group on a built-in tab, relative to a built-in group on the tab. For more information, see [How to: Customize a Built-in Tab](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab). 使用可在 Microsoft Office 菜单上使用的控件的属性(例如)来指定控件相对于菜单上的内置控件的位置。`Position`Use the `Position` property of controls that can be used on the Microsoft Office Menu, such as , to specify the location of the control relative to a built-in control on the menu. 当`Position`控件放置在功能区选项卡上时, 这些控件的属性将不起作用。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：向 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view)添加控件。The `Position` property of these controls has no effect when the controls are placed on a Ribbon tab. For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view). 使用的属性可以指定选项卡相对于内置选项卡的位置。 Use the property of a to specify the location of the tab relative to a built-in tab. 若要创建对象, 请调用对象的方法或方法。To create an object, call the method or the method of the object. 可以使用对象的 属性在运行时获取对象。You can get a object at run time by using the property of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class.

summary.span: 获取内置功能区控件、组或选项卡的 ID，当前的 将其用于定义另一控件、组或选项卡的相对位置。

span.span: Gets the ID of the built-in Ribbon control, group, or tab that the current uses to define a relative location for another control, group, or tab.

value.span: 内置功能区控件、组或选项卡的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Ribbon control, group, or tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ID 是唯一标识内置于 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的控件、组或选项卡的名称。The ID is a name that uniquely identifies a control, group, or tab that is built into a Microsoft Office application. 有关 id 列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心网页[Office 2010 帮助文件:Office 熟知用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。For a list of IDs, see the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 表示内置控件、组或选项卡之前还是之后的位置。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current represents a location before or after a built-in control, group, or tab.

value.span: 一个值, 该值指示当前是否表示内置控件、组或选项卡之前或之后的位置。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the current represents a location before or after a built-in control, group, or tab.
